\hypertarget{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_row_data_proxy}{}\doxysection{Open\+XLSX\+::XLRow\+Data\+Proxy Class Reference}
\label{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_row_data_proxy}\index{OpenXLSX::XLRowDataProxy@{OpenXLSX::XLRowDataProxy}}


The \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_row_data_proxy}{XLRow\+Data\+Proxy}} is used as a proxy object when getting or setting row data. The class facilitates easy conversion to/from containers.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$XLRow\+Data.\+hpp$>$}

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
The \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_row_data_proxy}{XLRow\+Data\+Proxy}} is used as a proxy object when getting or setting row data. The class facilitates easy conversion to/from containers. 

\doxysubsection{Member Function Documentation}
\mbox{\Hypertarget{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_row_data_proxy_abf500a0400450c87714e780b457706f5}\label{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_row_data_proxy_abf500a0400450c87714e780b457706f5}}

\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{operator Container()}{operator Container()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily template$<$typename Container , typename std\+::enable\+\_\+if$<$!std\+::is\+\_\+same\+\_\+v$<$ Container, \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_row_data_proxy}{XLRow\+Data\+Proxy}} $>$ \&\&std\+::is\+\_\+base\+\_\+of\+\_\+v$<$ typename std\+::bidirectional\+\_\+iterator\+\_\+tag, typename std\+::iterator\+\_\+traits$<$ typename Container\+::iterator $>$\+::iterator\+\_\+category $>$, Container $>$\+::type $\ast$  = nullptr$>$ \\
Open\+XLSX\+::\+XLRow\+Data\+Proxy\+::operator Container (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}{ }\end{DoxyParamCaption}) const\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}, {\ttfamily [explicit]}}



Explicit conversion operator. 

This function calls the convert\+Container template function to convert the row data to the container stipulated by the client. The reason that this function is marked explicit is that the implicit conversion operators above will be ambiguous. 
\begin{DoxyTemplParams}{Template Parameters}
{\em Container} & The container (and value) type to convert the row data to. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyTemplParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
The required container with the row data. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
